comments.enabled: Set to true to enable continuous learning (TEST THOROUGHLY FIRST!)
comments.learning_frequency: Options: 'daily', 'weekly', 'monthly' - How often to run optimization
comments.min_feedback_samples: Minimum number of trades before first optimization cycle
comments.max_parameter_change: Maximum allowed parameter change per optimization (0.30 = 30%)
comments.confidence_threshold: Minimum confidence score required to apply parameter updates (0.80 = 80%)
comments.learning_objectives: List of objectives to optimize for
comments.save_frequency: Save trade outcomes every N trades

safety_notes: Start with enabled=false to collect baseline data
Run test_forex_learning.py before enabling on live trader
Monitor first few optimization cycles closely
Can revert to baseline_parameters at any time
All parameter changes are logged in forex_learning_logs/parameters.json
